intro.title: VEGAS Foundation
subtitle: Redefining Traditional Investment Concepts in 2025
Make your funds flow
description: From Las Vegas to the world
ushering in a new era of wealth
intro.about: Vegas Foundation is a globally leading innovative financial institution dedicated to providing innovative financial services and asset management solutions for the global casino and gaming industry. The core goal of the foundation is to promote transparency, security, and stable profitability in the gaming industry!
intro.team: The founding team of Vegas Foundation includes globally renowned financial experts and an international professional operations team, committed to delivering high returns to partners and investors through its unique fund management system.

notice: Dear Vegas Family: The upgrade has been successfully completed. Version V1 will soon be discontinued. Family members who experienced loss of principal on their first bet, please send 1 USDT to the official payment address, and we will refund the principal to your earnings address. The V2 beta version has disabled reinvestment, direct referral earnings, and differential earnings. All family members are requested to use the official version for betting, which recognizes network relationships. Earnings will function normally, while differential earnings will be gradually opened by generation (3rd, 7th, 10th, and 15th) in the following month. We hope to provide you with a pleasant experience. Wishing everyone happy betting! - Vegas Foundation Technical Department
